Yeah, that really sucked. There was like, three Rioters there but it was pretty clear they weren't there for Company Representation.

Props to Rioters Jynx and Swimbananas (I could swear there was three) for showing up though, and also taking the time to make a survey asking if we want Riot to show up again (hell yeah I want that!)

Hey Kayunot, 

Thanks for calling me out! It was great meeting you at PAX East! The 3rd person was Jess F, the leader of the CSP team. She was wearing my Teemo hat, if that helps remind you. 

Every year we take some time to figure out what we want to do events wise. In 2016, we chose to go hard at PAX East with the reveal of the RiftWalk and Thresh. This year we chose PAX West. For 2018 and beyond, we're still exploring and figuring out what we may want to do. If we do choose to attend future PAX events, we'll be sure to announce it on our regular channels.


Thank you also for doing the survey!
If it jogs your memory, I was the guy in the dark cloak (Never did figure out what I wanted to cosplay though...) You two looked great with the yordle wigs!
I remember you! That was an epic dark cloak.

If you want a similar Dark Cloak, head to [King Richard's Faire in Massachusetts](https://kingrichardsfaire.net/) and look behind the Tournament area for Threads of Time. Bring your wallet though, mine cost like 250$ (probably more, don't have the exact receipt and there was a tax on it.)

There's other cool fantasy stores there including two Staff stores nearby and various jewelry vendors, perfect if you want to do a fantasy cosplay but not sure where to get costume commissions (again though, bring your wallet, the really high-quality stuff costs an arm and a leg x.x)

Atleast PAX East got something... while PAX South continues to receive neglect.  Pretty sure I typed a hefty complaint in the survey I received heh.. an AMD station with League gameplay just was not enough and down right (darius) disappointing.   But hey, a goody bag for winning a game with an AMD mousepad and shirt, cant beat that...........

I completely agree.  I went to the first PAX South and one of the biggest reasons is that Riot was supposed to have a large presence there.  I was hoping for some cool swag like a cool button or even a chance at a skin, but that would have been extra.  Mainly I was looking forward to an actual panel with possible reveals or real insight into the game/upcoming changes, and there were two big panels planned.  What I got was basically a drawn out summoners showcase talk.  And to make matters worse, Riot cancelled the other scheduled panel.  No swag at all.  Was highly disappointed. The rest of PAX was fun, but it was a major bummer that the biggest draw of PAX South for me was a complete dud.
We'd love to see Riot at PAX South some year... there's still time to get a spot!
I loved the presence at PAX East for many years. The stage/megabooth was always packed and fun. Heading to PAX South, and I really wish Riot would be there.
We can Only hope Riot will do something. 2018 PAX south is the weekend Before season 8. But who knows.
